title: Choco Love Birthday Brownie
description: A rich, chocolate-drizzled brownie cake topped with crunchy pearls and chocolate balls, personalized with a loving birthday message: "Happy Birthday Jeevi Babe

title: Rosy Whip Delight
description: A classic white cream cake decorated with elegant pink and white rose swirls, centered with crumbled cake bits for a soft, vintage touch

title: Nutty Choco Celebration Cake
description: A decadent chocolate brownie base loaded with chopped nuts, caramel drizzle, and signature chocolates, finished with a golden "Happy Birthday" topper.

title: Doraemon Fantasy Cake
description: A two-tier cake in soft blue and white tones, topped with a cheerful Doraemon figure – perfect for a kid’s birthday celebration with a cartoon theme.

title: Cherry Blush Heart Cake
description: A blush pink cream cake adorned with fluffy cream swirls, shiny red cherries, silver beads, and golden heart accents – a sweet gesture of love.

title: Butterfly Dreams Blueberry Cake
description: A dreamy lavender and white cake crowned with a delicate butterfly topper and filled with luscious blueberry glaze – perfect for a whimsical celebration.
